name: Frisk & Floss
description:
Frisk & Floss

Help Frisk navigate their solitary journey in the unknown world of NightWatch, overcoming challenges, making new friends and trying to make sense of this elusive world.

Frisk’s story begins when they are recruited at NightWatch as a defender of the Astral system. Unaware of this new world, they slowly gather an understanding of themselves and what it means to be there for one another in an isolated universe.

This is an hour-long mobile friendly experience for all ages.

Credits

Frisk & Floss is an interactive fiction story by imissmyfriends.studio. We are a two person, part-time indie game studio, learning to build fun and meaningful games.

  • Concept, Story & Art — Rhea Gupte
  • Development, Design & Art — Prateek Saxena

Special thanks to Ankur Sethi for his feedback & support 🖤

What's next?

We are releasing this as a prototype and plan to create a larger version exploring the intricacies of this world and the journeys of these characters. We would be immensely grateful to have feedback on the project so far.

Thank you for playing!

We have always loved playing games and this is a small step towards learning to build the games of our dreams. At the moment, we are making games part-time, growing our skills and exploring a few ideas. Please join us on our journey over at our Discord.
